full_summary:
**Phase 1 - Nonresidential Building Construction Services for Tulita Office and Cultural Centre**
------------------------------------

### Notice Details
| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4617433297-Doc4617447236 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4617433297 |
| **Publication Date** | June 05, 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | July 03, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |

### Project Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to submit their qualification bids for the Phase 1 Nonresidential Building Construction Services for the Tulita Office and Cultural Centre project. The project involves the construction of a Parks Canada Office and Cultural Centre building, and an auxiliary biomass heating facility, in Tulít'a, Northwest Territories.

### Procurement Details
| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Selection Criteria** | Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price |
| **Regions of Delivery** | Northwest Territories |
| **Contracting Authority** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| **Contact Person** | Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC) |

### Notice Information
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 03, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.
